title: Collaborative Workshop for Workplace-Based Assessment (WBA) and Feedback Literacy Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job-related knowledge and understanding of assessment processes
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment where professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields simultaneously serve as peer evaluators and evaluatees

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the core principles and application methods of Workplace-Based Assessment (WBA) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners will improve their feedback reception and utilization skills by 25% compared to baseline, as measured by the Feedback Literacy Scale (FLBS).
Learners will be able to propose three or more effective feedback exchange strategies for overcoming power differences through collaborative simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
